title: F-SiO2 Eables PLA-based Superhydrophobic Nanofiber Membrane with Highly Efficient Membrane Distillation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00611A, Paper
Yuqian He, Yanyan Ye, Mi Zhou, Linlin Yan, Yingjie Zhang, Enrico Drioli, Jun Ma, Yonggang Li, Xiquan Cheng
The superhydrophobic surface is generalized as a key role in constructing membrane distillation for desalination. Although perfluoroalkyl materials are proven to be a good candidate for membrane distillation, the lack...
